Articles.Content: In my 1.0 save I found parts that take the Mk3 shuttle parts and augments the bottom of the cargobay/cockpit to have ablative surface and be more flat while including wing mounts with gear. It have been looking for it for the past few days. If anyone could direct it to me that would be great.
Lacks the wheels and wings, but is the best out atm. For wings use B9 procedural wings.
